en.title: Your divorce
en.getDecreeNisi: Your {{ divorceWho }} gets a decree nisi

progressedNoAos.heading: Contact the Courts and Tribunals Service Centre
progressedNoAos.info: You can no longer respond to this application online. Contact the Courts and Tribunals Service Centre to find out what to do next.

progressedUndefended.heading: You have submitted your response
progressedUndefended.info: Your response will be checked. You will be sent an email when your divorce moves forward to the next stage. Contact the Courts and Tribunals Service Centre if you don’t hear anything back after 6 weeks.

awaitingAnswer.heading: You need to submit your answer
awaitingAnswer.para1: You must now submit the 'answer to a divorce application' form. The deadline for the court to receive this is 21 days from the date that you first signed in to respond to the application.
awaitingAnswer.para2: Download and fill in the paper form.
awaitingAnswer.para4: You’ll have to pay a £245 fee when you submit the form.
awaitingAnswer.para5: You’ll probably have to go to a hearing with your {{ divorceWho }} to try to come to an agreement over the divorce.
awaitingAnswer.para6: If you don’t submit your answer before the deadline, then your {{ divorceWho }} can continue the divorce as if you hadn’t said that you intended to defend the divorce.

defendedDivorce.heading: Your answer has been received by the court
defendedDivorce.para1: Your ‘answer’ to the divorce application has been received by the court.
defendedDivorce.para2: The court will now decide whether you and your wife will need to attend a hearing. You may be contacted for more information to help make that decision.
defendedDivorce.para3: If you do need to attend a hearing, you’ll be sent a letter in the post telling you when and where the hearing is.
defendedDivorce.para4: If the court decides that the divorce can go ahead, then the rest of the divorce will be online after the hearing.

decreeNisiAnnouncement.heading: Your {{ divorceWho }}’s decree nisi application has been accepted
decreeNisiAnnouncement.districtJudge: A district judge will formally announce the decree nisi at a court hearing. This is the first stage of the decree ending your marriage.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.secondStage: You’ll only be divorced when the second stage is complete and the decree is made absolute.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.moreDetails: You can find more details about the date of the hearing and the orders that will be made (including costs orders) in the Certificate Of Entitlement ({{ certificateOfEntitlementFile.fileType | upper }}).
decreeNisiAnnouncement.dontNeedToCome: You don’t need to come to the hearing unless you want to object to any of the court orders being made.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.wantToAttend: If you want to attend the hearing, you need to email the court before the hearing date.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.wantToAttendCosts: If you, or your {{ divorceWho }}, want to dispute a costs order, the court must receive a letter or email stating the reasons for doing so at least 14 days before the hearing date.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.acceptedCosts: The court has also decided to make an order that you pay towards the divorce costs.

decreeNisiGranted.heading: Your {{ divorceWho }} has been granted a decree nisi
decreeNisiGranted.dateGranted: On {{ session.originalPetition.decreeNisiGrantedDate | date }} the court granted your {{ divorceWho }} a:
decreeNisiGranted.decreeNisi: decree nisi - the first stage of the decree ending your marriage
decreeNisiGranted.costsOrder: costs order - giving your {{ divorceWho }} the right to claim their divorce costs
decreeNisiGranted.notDivorcedYet: You are not divorced yet. You will only be divorced when the second stage is complete and the decree has been made absolute.
decreeNisiGranted.divorceComplete: When the divorce can be completed
decreeNisiGranted.sixWeeks: Your {{ divorceWho }} must wait 6 weeks after the decree nisi is granted before they can apply for the decree absolute.
decreeNisiGranted.courtCancel: The court can cancel (known as rescind) the decree nisi at any time up until the decree absolute, if it’s presented with new evidence showing why you shouldn’t be given a divorce.
decreeNisiGranted.applyForDecreeAbsolute: You can apply for the decree absolute if your {{ divorceWho }} doesn’t. You’ll need to wait an extra 3 months after the 6 week period has passed to do this.
decreeNisiGranted.downloadDecreeNisi: Download your decree nisi ({{ decreeNisiFile.fileType | upper }}).
decreeNisiGranted.whatCostsOrder: What to do with the costs order
decreeNisiGranted.orderWillStateRespondent: The order will state what the court has decided you must pay your {{ divorceWho }}. You are required to pay them within 14 days of the order being made. If you don’t pay within that time, your {{ divorceWho }} can use the order to make a civil money claim against you.
decreeNisiGranted.orderWillStateCoRespondent: The order will state what the court has decided the co-respondent must pay your {{ divorceWho }}. You are required to pay them within 14 days of the order being made. If you don’t pay within that time, your {{ divorceWho }} can use the order to make a civil money claim against you.
decreeNisiGranted.orderWillStateRespondentAndCoRespondent: The order will state what the court has decided you and your co-respondent must pay your {{ divorceWho }}. You are required to pay them within 14 days of the order being made. If you don’t pay within that time, your {{ divorceWho }} can use the order to make a civil money claim against you.
decreeNisiGranted.downloadCostsOrder: Download your costs order ({{ costsOrderFile.fileType | upper }}).

aosAwaitingSol.heading: You have nominated a solicitor
aosAwaitingSol.nominatedSol: You have nominated a solicitor to respond to your {{ divorceWho }}’s divorce application on your behalf.
aosAwaitingSol.nextDetails: Your solicitor will receive instructions on how  to respond on your behalf. They must respond  to the application within 7 working days. If they don’t, your {{ divorceWho }} can ask the court to move the divorce forward without you. You may have to pay extra fees if this happens.
aosAwaitingSol.nextDetailsMoreTime: If you are a respondent living outside of England and Wales, then your solicitor may have more days to reply to this divorce. Please refer to this below link:
aosAwaitingSol.nextDetailsMoreTimeLink: https://www.justice.gov.uk/courts/procedure-rules/family/practice_directions/pd_part_06b

other.heading: Please contact the Courts and Tribunals Service Centre for more information

en.helpContent: You can contact the service centre if you need help. Court staff can’t give you legal advice however, and you should speak to a solicitor or legal adviser.
en.improveContent: Please help us improve this service by leaving your feedback.
en.divorceCenterHours:
(Monday, Wednesday and Friday -phones are open 8am-6pm and Webchat open 8am-8pm.
Tuesday and Thursday - Webchat and phones are open 8am-8pm.
Saturdays - Webchat and phones are open 8am-2pm.)

cy.title: Eich ysgariad
cy.husbandWifeApplied: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} yn gwneud cais
cy.getDecreeNisi: Bydd eich {{ divorceWho }} yn cael dyfarniad nisi

progressedNoAos.heading: Cysylltu â Chanolfan Wasanaeth y Llysoedd a’r Tribiwnlysoedd
progressedNoAos.info: Ni allwch ymateb i’r cais hwn ar-lein mwyach. Cysylltwch â Chanolfan Wasanaeth y Llysoedd a’r Tribiwnlysoedd i gael gwybod beth i’w wneud nesaf.

progressedUndefended.heading: Rydych wedi cyflwyno eich ymateb
progressedUndefended.info: Byddwn yn gwirio eich ymateb. Byddwch yn cael neges e-bost pan fydd eich ysgariad yn symud ymlaen i’r cam nesaf. Cysylltwch â Chanolfan Wasanaeth y Llysoedd a’r Tribiwnlysoedd os na fyddwch wedi clywed gennym ar ôl 6 wythnos.

awaitingAnswer.heading: Mae angen ichi gyflwyno ateb
awaitingAnswer.para1: You must now submit the 'ffurflen ymateb i gais am ysgariad', Rhaid i’r llys dderbyn hon o fewn 21 diwrnod i’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch fewngofnodi gyntaf i ymateb i’r cais.
awaitingAnswer.para2: Llwytho ffurflen bapur i lawr a’i llenwi.
awaitingAnswer.para4: Bydd rhaid i chi dalu ffi o £245 pan fyddwch yn cyflwyno’r ffurflen.
awaitingAnswer.para5: Mae’n debyg y bydd yn rhaid i chi fynd i wrandawiad gyda’ch {{ divorceWho }}  i geisio dod i gytundeb ynghylch yr ysgariad.
awaitingAnswer.para6: Os na fyddwch yn cyflwyno eich ateb mewn pryd, gall eich {{ divorceWho }}  barhau gyda’r ysgariad fel pe baech heb ddweud eich bod yn bwriadu ei amddiffyn.

defendedDivorce.heading: Mae’r llys wedi derbyn eich ateb
defendedDivorce.para1: Mae’r llys wedi derbyn eich ‘ateb’ i’r cais am ysgariad.
defendedDivorce.para2: Bydd y llys yn awr yn penderfynu a fydd gofyn i chi a’ch gwraig fynychu gwrandawiad. Efallai y byddir yn cysylltu â chi i gael mwy o wybodaeth cyn gwneud y penderfyniad hwnnw.
defendedDivorce.para3: Os bydd gofyn ichi fynychu gwrandawiad, byddwch yn cael llythyr drwy’r post yn eich hysbysu ynglyn ag amser a lleoliad y gwrandawiad.
defendedDivorce.para4: Os bydd y llys yn penderfynu y gall yr ysgariad fynd yn ei flaen, bydd gweddill yr ysgariad yn digwydd ar-lein ar ôl y gwrandawiad.

decreeNisiAnnouncement.heading: Derbyniwyd cais eich {{ divorceWho }} am ddyfarniad nisi
decreeNisiAnnouncement.districtJudge: Bydd Barnwr Rhanbarth yn cyhoeddi’r dyfarniad nisi yn ffurfiol mewn gwrandawiad llys. Dyma gam cyntaf y dyfarniad fydd yn dod â’ch priodas i ben.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.secondStage: Dim ond pan fydd yr ail gam wedi’i gwblhau a phan wneir y dyfarniad absoliwt y byddwch wedi ysgaru.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.moreDetails: Gallwch gael mwy o fanylion am ddyddiad y gwrandawiad a’r gorchmynion y byddir yn eu gwneud (yn cynnwys gorchmynion costau) yn y Dystysgrif Hawl ({{ certificateOfEntitlementFile.fileType | upper }}).
decreeNisiAnnouncement.dontNeedToCome: Nid oes angen ichi ddod i’r gwrandawiad oni bai eich bod am wrthwynebu unrhyw rai o’r gorchmynion llys sy’n cael eu gwneud.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.wantToAttend: Os ydych eisiau mynychu’r gwrandawiad, bydd angen ichi anfon neges e-bost i’r llys cyn dyddiad y gwrandawiad.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.wantToAttendCosts: Os ydych chi, neu’ch {{ divorceWho }} eisiau gwrthwynebu gorchymyn costau, rhaid i’r llys gael llythyr neu neges e-bost yn nodi’r rhesymau dros wneud hynny o leiaf 14 diwrnod cyn dyddiad y gwrandawiad.
decreeNisiAnnouncement.acceptedCosts: Mae’r llys wedi penderfynu gwneud gorchymyn ichi dalu tuag at gostau’r ysgariad.

decreeNisiGranted.heading: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cael dyfarniad nisi
decreeNisiGranted.dateGranted: Ar {{ session.originalPetition.decreeNisiGrantedDate | date }} penderfynodd y llys y byddai eich {{ divorceWho }} yn cael:
decreeNisiGranted.decreeNisi: dyfarniad nisi - dyma gam cyntaf y dyfarniad fydd yn dod â’ch priodas i ben
decreeNisiGranted.costsOrder: gorchymyn costau - sy’n rhoi’r hawl i’ch {{ divorceWho }} hawlio costau’r ysgariad
decreeNisiGranted.notDivorcedYet: Nid ydych wedi ysgaru eto. Dim ond pan fydd yr ail gam wedi’i gwblhau ac y byddwch wedi cael eich dyfarniad absoliwt y byddwch wedi ysgaru.
decreeNisiGranted.sixWeeks: Rhaid i’ch {{ divorceWho }} aros am 6 wythnos ar ôl caniatáu eich datganiad nisi cyn y gall wneud cais am ddyfarniad absoliwt.
decreeNisiGranted.courtCancel: Gall y llys ganslo (gelwir hynny’n ‘dadwneud’) y datganiad nisi unrhyw bryd hyd at y dyfarniad absoliwt, os cyflwynir tystiolaeth newydd i’r llys yn dangos na ddylech gael ysgariad.
decreeNisiGranted.applyForDecreeAbsolute: Gallwch wneud cais am ddyfarniad absoliwt os na bydd eich {{ divorceWho }} yn gwneud hynny. Bydd angen ichi aros am 3 mis arall ar ôl i’r cyfnod o 6 wythnos ddod i ben i wneud hynny.
decreeNisiGranted.downloadDecreeNisi: Llwytho eich dyfarniad nisi i lawr ({{ decreeNisiFile.fileType | upper }}).
decreeNisiGranted.whatCostsOrder: Beth i’w wneud gyda’r Gorchymyn Costau
decreeNisiGranted.orderWillStateRespondent: Bydd y gorchymyn yn nodi faint mae’r llys wedi penderfynu y bydd rhaid ichi dalu i’ch {{ divorceWho }}. Bydd rhaid ichi dalu o fewn 14 diwrnod i ddyddiad y gorchymyn. Os na fyddwch yn talu o fewn y cyfnod hwnnw, gall eich {{ divorceWho }}  ddefnyddio’r gorchymyn i wneud hawliad am arian yn eich erbyn.
decreeNisiGranted.orderWillStateCoRespondent: Bydd y gorchymyn yn nodi faint mae’r llys wedi penderfynu y bydd yn rhaid i’r cyd-atebydd dalu i’ch {{ divorceWho }} . Bydd rhaid ichi dalu o fewn 14 diwrnod i ddyddiad y gorchymyn. Os na fyddwch yn talu o fewn y cyfnod hwnnw, gall eich {{ divorceWho }}  ddefnyddio’r gorchymyn i wneud hawliad am arian yn eich erbyn.
decreeNisiGranted.orderWillStateRespondentAndCoRespondent: Bydd y gorchymyn yn nodi faint mae’r llys wedi penderfynu y bydd yn rhaid i chi a’ch cyd-atebydd dalu i’ch {{ divorceWho }} . Bydd rhaid ichi dalu o fewn 14 diwrnod i ddyddiad y gorchymyn. Os na fyddwch yn talu o fewn y cyfnod hwnnw, gall eich {{ divorceWho }}  ddefnyddio’r gorchymyn i wneud hawliad am arian yn eich erbyn.
decreeNisiGranted.downloadCostsOrder: Llwytho eich gorchymyn costau i lawr ({{ costsOrderFile.fileType | upper }}).

aosAwaitingSol.heading: Rydych wedi penodi cyfreithiwr
aosAwaitingSol.nominatedSol: Rydych wedi penodi cyfreithiwr i ymateb ar eich rhan i gais eich {{ divorceWho }} am ysgariad.
aosAwaitingSol.nextDetails: Bydd eich cyfreithiwr yn derbyn cyfarwyddiadau yn egluro sut i ymateb ar eich rhan. Rhaid i’r cyfreithiwr ymateb i’r cais o fewn 7 diwrnod. Os na fydd yn gwneud hynny, gall eich {{ divorceWho }} ofyn i’r llys fwrw ymlaen â’r ysgariad heboch. Mae’n bosib y bydd rhaid ichi dalu ffioedd ychwanegol os digwydd hyn.

other.heading: Cysylltwch â Chanolfan Wasanaeth y Llysoedd a’r Tribiwnlysoedd i gael rhagor o wybodaeth

cy.helpContent: Os ydych angen cymorth, gallwch gysylltu â’r ganolfan ysgaru. Fodd bynnag, ni all staff y llys roi cyngor cyfreithiol ichi, a dylech siarad â chyfreithiwr neu gynghorydd cyfreithiol.
cy.improveHeading: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn
cy.improveContent: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn drwy cynnig sylwadau ar y gwasanaeth .

defendedContact.name: Uned yr Iaith Gymraeg Canolfan Gyfiawnder Caernarfon
